entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow late in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning and early afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
